alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 21 at 7:49PM CST until February 26 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Columbia. * WHEN...Until late Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CST Tuesday the stage was 20.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Saturday afternoon and continue falling to 16.1 feet Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri Pearl River Columbia 17.0 20.4 Tue 7 pm CST 19.6 18.7 17.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 900 AM CST.
